languages.text: "Но помни..." {n}В глазах Инцендии сверкает маниакальный блеск.{/n} "Никто из лидеров бунта не должен умереть прежде, чем предстанет перед судом. Я запрещаю свершать над ними самовольную расправу".
"But remember..." {n}Incendia's eyes flash maniacally.{/n} "None of the rebel leaders are allowed to die before their trial. I forbid you to execute them without my leave."
languages.original_text: "Но помни..." {n}В глазах Инцендии сверкает маниакальный блеск.{/n} "Никто из лидеров бунта не должен умереть прежде, чем предстанет перед судом. Я запрещаю свершать над ними самовольную расправу".

traits.locale_text: "But remember..." {n}Incendia's eyes flash maniacally.{/n} "None of the rebel leaders is allowed to die before their trial. I forbid you to execute them without my leave."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "But remember..." {n}Incendia's eyes flash maniacally.{/n} "None of the rebel leaders is allowed to die before their trial. I forbid you to execute them without my leave."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "But remember..." {n}Incendia's eyes flash maniacally.{/n} "None of the rebel leaders are allowed to die before their trial. I forbid you to execute them without my leave."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "But remember..." {n}Incendia's eyes flash maniacally.{/n} "None of the rebel leaders are allowed to die before their trial. I forbid you to execute them without my leave."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "But remember..." {n}Incendia's eyes flash maniacally.{/n} "None of the rebel leaders are allowed to die before their trial. I forbid you to execute them without my leave."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "But remember..." {n}Incendia's eyes flash maniacally.{/n} "None of the rebel leaders are allowed to die before their trial. I forbid you to execute them without my leave."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: “但别忘了……”{n}因森蒂娅的双眼中闪烁着狂热的光芒。{/n}“举行审判之前，那些叛军首领一个都不能死。我不允许你未经我允许擅自处决他们。”
languages.original_text: "But remember..." {n}Incendia's eyes flash maniacally.{/n} "None of the rebel leaders are allowed to die before their trial. I forbid you to execute them without my leave."

traits.locale_text: “但别忘了……”{n}因森蒂娅的双眼中闪烁着狂热的光芒。{/n}“举行审判之前，那些叛军首领一个都不能死。我不允许你未经我允许擅自处决他们。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「だが、覚えておけ…」{n}インセンディアの目が毒々しく光った。{/n}「反逆者は裁判前に死ぬ権利を持たない。私の承諾なしの処刑執行は禁じる」
languages.original_text: "But remember..." {n}Incendia's eyes flash maniacally.{/n} "None of the rebel leaders are allowed to die before their trial. I forbid you to execute them without my leave."

traits.locale_text: 「だが、覚えておけ…」{n}インセンディアの目が毒々しく光った。{/n}「反逆者は裁判前に死ぬ権利を持たない。私の承諾なしの処刑執行は禁じる」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «Pero recuerde...». {n}A Incendia le brillan los ojos.{/n} «Ninguno de los líderes rebeldes puede morir antes de su juicio. Le prohíbo que los ejecute sin mi permiso».
languages.original_text: "But remember..." {n}Incendia's eyes flash maniacally.{/n} "None of the rebel leaders are allowed to die before their trial. I forbid you to execute them without my leave."

traits.locale_text: «Pero recuerde...». {n}A Incendia le brillan los ojos.{/n} «Ninguno de los líderes rebeldes puede morir antes de su juicio. Le prohíbo que los ejecute sin mi permiso».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Aber denkt daran ..." {n}Incendias Augen blitzen manisch auf.{/n} "Keiner der Rebellenanführer darf vor seinem Prozess sterben. Ich verbiete Euch, sie ohne meine Erlaubnis hinzurichten."
languages.original_text: "But remember..." {n}Incendia's eyes flash maniacally.{/n} "None of the rebel leaders are allowed to die before their trial. I forbid you to execute them without my leave."

traits.locale_text: "Aber denkt daran ..." {n}Incendias Augen blitzen manisch auf.{/n} "Keiner der Rebellenanführer darf vor seinem Prozess sterben. Ich verbiete Euch, sie ohne meine Erlaubnis hinzurichten."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « Mais n'oubliez pas... {n}poursuit-elle avec une lueur démente dans les yeux.{/n} Aucun des chefs rebelles n'est autorisé à mourir avant d'être jugé. Je vous interdis de les exécuter sans ma permission. »
languages.original_text: "But remember..." {n}Incendia's eyes flash maniacally.{/n} "None of the rebel leaders are allowed to die before their trial. I forbid you to execute them without my leave."

traits.locale_text: « Mais n'oubliez pas... {n}poursuit-elle avec une lueur démente dans les yeux.{/n} Aucun des chefs rebelles n'est autorisé à mourir avant d'être jugé. Je vous interdis de les exécuter sans ma permission. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Unutma ama..." {n}İncendia'nın gözlerinde delice bir parıltı var.{/n} "İsyancı liderlerinin hiçbirinin yargılanmadan önce ölmemesi gerek. İznim olmadan onları idam etmeni yasaklıyorum."
languages.original_text: "But remember..." {n}Incendia's eyes flash maniacally.{/n} "None of the rebel leaders are allowed to die before their trial. I forbid you to execute them without my leave."

traits.locale_text: "Unutma ama..." {n}İncendia'nın gözlerinde delice bir parıltı var.{/n} "İsyancı liderlerinin hiçbirinin yargılanmadan önce ölmemesi gerek. İznim olmadan herhangi birini idam etmeni yasaklıyorum."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
